clue: Cast characters in "The Call of the Wild"
explanation: To cast (or throw), is to LOFT. The characters of LOFT are found in "the calL OF The wild".
hints: Think of a meaning of "cast" that isn't about actors.
"Characters in" suggests a hidden answer in the title.
With hidden word clues, the characters to find will always be consecutive, but may straddle word breaks.
